entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 07 January 2023
